title: Senior Graphic Designer
company_info: No information added.
address: GREAT WORLD CITY, 1 KIM SENG PROMENADE 237994
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Responsibilities
1. Design and produce engaging visuals for client presentations, award submissions, internal and external newsletters, as well as social media.
2. Coordinate and lead in art direction for photo and video shoots, and handle digital retouching and image editing.
3. Work independently as well as cooperatively with cross-functional team members and partners to deliver successful outcomes, including project, timeline and budget management.
4. Stay up-to-date on industry trends and the latest design techniques software to continuously improve design skills.
5. Maintain archive of the company’s visual assets e.g. photos, videos, graphics.

Required Skills & Qualifications
• Exceptional creativity and innovative design skills with a strong portfolio that showcases expertise in design, creativity, and aesthetic sense.
• At least 6-10 years of relevant experience, preferably with a creative or marketing agency.
• Proficient in design software (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign). Good knowledge of video editing software (Premiere Pro, After Effects) and experience in creating video content for social is not required, but will be a plus.
• Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, to effectively collaborate with senior leaders and cross-functional teams. You don’t have to be the chattiest person around (introverts are welcome!), but you got to be able to present your ideas well.
• Strong team player with a positive attitude, conducive to working collaboratively and
seeking feedback.
• Strong time management skills for meeting deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
• Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent) in graphic design, art, or related disciplines.

title: Graphic Designer
company_info: No information added.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
We are expanding our Tipsy Family! If you are passionate about F&B and looking for a job that is thrilling and fulfilling, you'll love it here at Tipsy Collective! We are looking for energetic, motivated individuals who enjoy working in an ever-changing environment.

A People-First Culture Tipsy Collective is a multi-concept holding group led by a team of passionate individuals who seek to present hospitality uniquely through a series of thoughtful concepts. Tipsy Collective's brand and its foundation was built from the client lens as a basis for everything we do. It is this exceptional client loyalty and our talented employees that form our bedrock.

Why join us?
At Tipsy Collective, we offer you 4 Value Propositions we hold closely to our heart which are
Healthy Working Environment – Providing you a safe, fun, and healthy workspace while you thrive.
Adaptability – Being prepared and have the agility to prepare solutions for any situations.
Innovation – Coming together to brainstorm and execute great and fun ideas.
Growth – Seeking new concepts and ideas to bring new experience to you.

Responsibilities:
Conceptualise and design both physical and digital marketing collaterals for the various concepts under Tipsy Collective Group
Create moodboards and propose ideas for various concepts' design style
Assist in developing and executing marketing campaigns/promotions when required.
Monitor and identify relevant trends on social media, new tools, and applications
Edit and proofread a variety of content across digital channels (social, web, marketing) ensuring each concept meets style, tone and marketing message requirements as well as reflecting the overall brand

Requirements:
Design portfolio that showcases a variety of design works
Candidate must possess at least a Professional Certificate, Art/Design/Creative Multimedia or equivalent
Knowledge in Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe InDesign and Graphic Designing skills
Knowledge of Adobe After Effects and Motion Graphic skills will be a bonus.
At least 1 year of working experience in the related field is required for this position
Work independently with minimum supervision
Enjoy working in a fast-paced and collaborative environment
A background working with companies in hospitality, lifestyle, F&B will be advantageous
Good communication skills, flexible and the ability to think out of the box.
Language requirements include proficiency in both standard English and Mandarin for both writing and reading skills.


Explore Career Opportunities with us by applying now!

You can also check out the links below to see what Tipsy is up to!
https://www.tipsycollective.com/ https://www.instagram.com/TipsyCollectiveSg/ https://www.tiktok.com/@tipsycollectivesg

title: Junior Graphic Designer
company_info: No information added.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Join us in an exciting phase of growth and expansion at The Brewerkz Group!
As a Junior Graphic Designer, your primary focus will be on enhancing the digital visual identity of the Brewerkz and Café Iguana brands within The Brewerkz Group, while also actively supporting the team in creative adaptations. Brewerkz is a multi-award-winning craft brewery with five thriving restaurants in Singapore, recognised as a Made with Passion brand and celebrated as Singapore’s longest-running craft brewery experience. Café Iguana serves modern Mexican food and is a pioneer of the Mexican food scene in Singapore.
Our portfolio of brands is in a state of dynamic expansion, and as part of this exciting growth, we are thrilled to introduce an up-and-coming F&B brand. Although we can't reveal all the details just yet, rest assured it's a venture brimming with potential.
As a Junior Graphic Designer who is spirited and self-driven, and who shares our passion for the F&B industry, this role opens doors to a diverse range of responsibilities. Your journey will encompass absorbing learning experiences, engaging with a variety of tasks, and collaborating closely with our exciting partner brands. Notably, you will also enjoy the distinctive privilege of working in direct collaboration with business owners, contributing wholeheartedly to our collective expansion.
Responsibilities
This role will report to the Art Director and provide essential support in content development, with a primary emphasis on the digital landscape. Your role will be crucial in enhancing our digital presence and maintaining a consistent visual identity across platforms.
The major responsibilities of this role include:
Working closely with the marketing team to design and create marketing collateral
Developing and updating existing artwork, including but not limited to promotional materials, menu updates, and printed display materials
Contribute to and propose creative concepts for brands, product/ services, and campaigns
Assisting in food photography (bonus if you are able to handle DSLR and perform photography)
Ensure accuracy and proper execution of artwork within deadlines
Liaising with vendors for quotation and delivery of printed materials
Provide ad-hoc administrative duties to support creative activities and projects
Identifying and staying up-to-date with digital and social media trends, and proposing appropriate actions to increase brand awareness and customer engagement
Requirement:
Candidate must possess at least Diploma/Degree in Graphic Design/ Media Design
At least 2 years’ of relevant working experience
Proficient in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, After Effects and Premiere Pro is essential
Ability to conceptualise, visualise and create media assets that are optimised for digital platforms
An excellent sense of visual design
Ability to work effectively both in a team and independently
Competency in multimedia skills, including video and audio editing is a bonus.
Competency in basic HTML coding, WordPress, BigCommerce, web programming is a bonusJoin us in an exciting phase of growth and expansion at The Brewerkz Group!
As a Junior Graphic Designer, your primary focus will be on enhancing the digital visual identity of the Brewerkz and Café Iguana brands within The Brewerkz Group, while also actively supporting the team in creative adaptations. Café Iguana serves modern Mexican food and is a pioneer of the Mexican food scene in Singapore.
Our portfolio of brands is in a state of dynamic expansion, and as part of this exciting growth, we are thrilled to introduce an up-and-coming F&B brand. Although we can't reveal all the details just yet, rest assured it's a venture brimming with potential.
As a Junior Graphic Designer who is spirited and self-driven, and who shares our passion for the F&B industry, this role opens doors to a diverse range of responsibilities. We welcome people who are curious and enjoy new challenges to better themselves with passion, grit and determination. job_category: Admin / Secretarial, Design, Education and Training
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
About the role
We are seeking someone with an eye for visual storytelling and the motivation to create captivating and strategic design works.
This role requires a highly creative and imaginative individual who can operate within the framework of our style and brand guidelines to produce original, provocative, and engaging visual content. Our ideal candidate has a strong portfolio of successful design work, preferably with editorial publication background, and comprehensive, expert-level knowledge of full Creative Adobe Suite and related design software.

In addition to creative aptitude, you are able to work independently and add your own flair to the creative. You are able to approach the creative process with logical and strategic thinking, and are confident to share suggestions on how to improve the creative works. You also have a deep sense of ownership and strive to come up with stellar-quality creative works for your projects.

Responsibilities
Conceptualise, visualise and craft concepts for existing projects and creative pitches across both print and digital platforms
Work closely with Client Servicing team and Executive Creative Director to ensure a unified, client-centric approach to visual solutions
Review creative works with the Executive Creative Director when necessary
Provide guidance and art direction to junior designers and freelancers
Deliver novel visual solutions within stipulated brand and style guidelines
Contribute meaningfully to creative discussions with the team
Be independent and time-sensitive to manage your own workload based on project deadlines

Requirements
Bachelor/Diploma in Graphic Design preferred
At least a minimum of 3-4 years of working experience
In-depth knowledge and application of design software, with proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, etc) and PowerPoint
Excellent communication, a supportive team-player and problem-solving skills
Able to work independently and be responsible for the quality of your work
Matured and open to constructive feedback from manager and peers to meet clients’ expectations
Possess the curiosity, drive and passion to learn and apply new skills and processes

Singaporeans and PRs are encouraged to apply. Recruitment agencies will not be entertained.

How to apply:
If you share similar enthusiasm and with us, please email your resume indicating your availability and expected salary with a cover letter and your design portfolio. Do provide a link to your portfolio together with your application.

Send your application to: sandra@aetoscomms.com and aiwei@aetoscomms.com

Who we are:
We are a budding integrated design communications consultancy, and we embrace our people with a work culture to strive towards work-life balance and celebrate life! We welcome people who are curious and enjoy new challenges to better themselves with passion, grit and determination.

If you feel that you have what it takes in managing a reasonably exciting workload while exploring new challenges in corporate branding as well as digital and print communications, you're most welcome to join us!

title: Graphic Designer
company_info: IPG DXTRA (Singapore) Pte Ltd is a wholly owned unit of The Interpublic Group of Companies (IPG), the world’s leading marketing communications company. IPG DXTRA is made up of IPG’s specialist marketing services agencies, including Weber Shandwick, DeVries, Octagon, Jack Morton and Golin.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Graphic Designer (Mid to Senior) Jack Morton Worldwide

Who we are:
We are the world’s leading brand experience agency
We specialise in creating communication programmes for business, consumer, and employee audiences through interactive, immersive, and emotional channels such as events, conferences, incentives, video and digital.
Our clients engage us to help them build, reinforce, and create advocates for their brands
We take our work seriously, but not ourselves. We demystify smart and speak like humans (no jargon, please). We embrace our delightful diversity and get joy out of seeing our impact on people. Most of all, we believe in each other and love growing our Jack family.

We are looking for individuals interested in fulltime opportunities. With the nature of our business, we need to be ready at a moment’s notice to support the needs of our clients and sometimes, that requires us to look outside of the agency. We are looking to create relationships with trusted individuals that could be called upon when our team needs the support.

That brings us to you.

The position:
As a Graphic Designer in our brand experience agency, your task is to help conceptualise and execute stunning and creative designs based on given art direction. You’ll play a crucial supporting role in the creative process from ideation to visualisation and mock ups to executing final artwork during execution.
You’ll work closely with the creative team, under the leadership of the design directors to help bring to life design solutions for live events, virtual events, digital UI/UX and social platforms, keeping ideas and the visual language in which, they are expressed on brand.
The person we are looking for:
At least 4-8 years’ experience in an event-based industry/advertising agency/design house
Excellent graphic design and artistic skills backed up strong software knowledge for image editing, illustration, layout design and preparing final artwork for production.
You’re a guru in Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign
Having C4D/Blender knowledge is a plus
A team player, strong eagerness to learn and passionate about creating designs that resonate and matter to our audience
Strong drive to deliver world class visuals for brand experiences, integrated consumer campaigns, PR, online and offline activation.
Willingness to be involved in all stages of the creative process: ideation to design to final artwork execution.
Can demonstrate the ability to input and voice your point of view
Embodies creative and artistic presentation skills; the ability to think visually and collaborate with other creative team members
Passionate about art, design, culture and current affairs and you keep up to date with the events, creative and media industry
Good organisational skills, and excellent communications skill
Fluent in spoken and written English
You are based in Singapore
To apply for this position, please email a covering letter and CV to Shahira_Khalid@jackmorton.com

title: Design and Communications Intern
company_info: Born out of the desire to enhance the breastfeeding experience for both mother and baby, Hegen aims to simplify and complement the nursing experience, ensuring babies get the best nutrients in their diet while turning nursing into a positive bonding experience that mothers enjoy. Designed to complement the user experience and minimise spillage and wastage – making every drop count and maximising the goodness that can be drawn from nature’s gift; Hegen's revolutionary, practical and multifunctional designs encourage a sustainable and hassle free breastfeeding lifestyle, allowing mothers to carry on breastfeeding for as long as they want. Hegen was first established through the personal experience of our Founder and Managing Director, Yvon Bock’s personal experience as a breastfeeding mother and desire to create a difference for breastfeeding mothers and baby. Being a mother of 4 and having spent almost 10 years breastfeeding her children, she brings her real-life experiences into the business. It was her vision that helped develop a revolutionary and innovative brand for the industry. "When we first envisioned our brand, it was all about trying to make a difference. At that time, we read a breastfeeding survey conducted that out of…“95% of mothers who initiate breastfeeding, only 21% of them sustained this for 6 months or more.” It was then that we decided that our vision and mission for Hegen is to try and bring about change." -- Yvon Bock Hegen’s vision is to create a difference for breastfeeding mothers by simplifying and complementing the breastfeeding experience for both mother and child and ensuring babies get the best nutrients in their diet while turning nursing into a positive bonding experience to be enjoyed. Our mission is for parents and babies to cherish nature’s gift through innovative, revolutionary and sustainable solutions, which enhances the breastfeeding lifestyle. We aim to help increase the percentage of mothers who breastfeed up to six months or more and prolong the breastfeeding journey.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Hegen is a fast-growing company specialising in mother and baby products and with a mission to enhance the breastfeeding journey and help ease the transition into parenthood with meaningful products and services. As one of the top 10 fastest growing companies in Singapore, Hegen takes pride in creating innovative and practical solutions for time-strapped parents

THE ROLE – Design and Communications Intern

Hegen offers creative, passionate and detail-oriented Design and Communications Intern the opportunity to partake in Hegen’s storytelling through captivating graphic designs and compelling copywriting. Being at the wheel, the Design and Communications Intern is proactive in gaining his/her exposure. By taking the wheel, the Design and Communications Intern is proactive in staying abreast with the latest design and social media trends. With your creative flair, and an ability for crafting engaging content across various platforms, you will contribute effectively to building a reliable brand guideline for Hegen.

Responsibilities:
Contribute to Hegen's expanding portfolio of physical and digital assets through creative design and content creation
Partake in Hegen's storytelling by producing visually appealing graphic designs that resonate with our audience
Utilise strong copywriting abilities to craft compelling and effective messaging across multiple platforms

title: Digital Graphics Journalist, The Straits Times
company_info: SPH Media’s mission is to be the trusted source of news on Singapore and Asia, to represent the communities that make up Singapore, and to connect them to the world. It has several business segments in the media industry, including the publishing of newspapers, magazines, and books in both print and digital editions. It also owns and operates other businesses including radio stations and outdoor media.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
You will be part of The Straits Times Product & Audience Growth team that drives and implements an audience-first strategy in the newsroom, finding innovative ways to showcase and amplify content to various audiences across different platforms.

As a Digital Graphics Journalist, you would be expected to work closely with journalists, developers, designers, and editors on a daily basis.

Responsibilities
Write, design and help the team's developers build visual stories for the newsroom, including data visualisations and a wide variety of visual formats for storytelling.
Carry out investigative journalism/research with journalists using data, including finding/verifying data sources.
Use various statistics and data science tools for data parsing, scraping and wrangling. Access APIs or external data sources where necessary.
Manage workflow and process for data-driven and visual stories in the newsroom
Use analytics to evaluate stories and propose changes to workflow, concepts
Job Requirement
Bachelor’s degree in journalism, graphic design, data science, statistics or computer science
Experience in journalism and reporting (including internship) is an advantage
Comfortable in either two or more of the following: journalism and/or reporting; data visualisation and/or infographics design; front-end web development; or data analysis programming.
Experience working with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript including one frontend framework (React, VueJS, Svelte) is essential.
Experience building interactive graphics using libraries such as d3.js and Mapbox. Experience with serverless computing (AWS) is an advantage.
Experience with one or more common databases, SQL, scripting languages (R, Python, Perl) is preferred.
Familiar with the latest digital storytelling, data journalism and visual trends.
A team player, willing to share and support other team members
Attention to details, and demonstrate strong analytical and critical thinking skills
Able to work on a flexible schedule, that may include nights or weekends.

title: Creative Graphic Designer
company_info: W Hotels is a contemporary, design-led lifestyle brand and the industry innovator with 60 hotels and retreats, including 14 W-branded residences, in the most vibrant cities and exotic destinations around the world. Inspiring, iconic, innovative and influential, W Hotels provides the ultimate in insider access, offering a unique mix of cutting-edge design and passions around fashion, music and entertainment. W Hotels offers a holistic lifestyle experience that is integrated into the brand’s sensibility through contemporary restaurant concepts, glamorous entertainment experiences, stylish retail concepts, signature spas and inspiring residences. With more than 13 years of proven success, W Hotels is on track to reach 60 hotels by the end of 2015. W Hotels have been announced for Guangzhou, Singapore, Milan, Shanghai, Abu Dhabi, Bangkok, Athens – Astir Palace, Muscat, Mumbai, and Sante Fe, Mexico, while upcoming W Retreats include Verbier and Mexico’s Riviera Maya. For more information, visit www.whotels.com. East meets West on the island of Sentosa, where W Singapore – Sentosa Cove resides. Situated just off the southern tip of Singapore, the island’s vibrant beach bars alternate with chic restaurants, indulgent spas, and tempting attractions, like Universal Studios or the casino at Resorts World Sentosa.
address: W SINGAPORE SENTOSA COVE HOTEL, 21 OCEAN WAY 098374
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
JOB SUMMARY
Designs and produces marketing materials including, but not limited to, advertisements, collateral, signage, flash pieces, electronic brochures and presentations to drive hotel revenue.


CANDIDATE PROFILE

Education and Experience
• High school diploma or GED; 5 years experience in the customer service, call center operations, or related professional area.
OR
• Associates or Bachelors degree in Computer Graphics or a related field, or related major; 3 years experience in Computer Graphics or a related professional area.


CORE WORK ACTIVITIES
Graphic Design Operations
• Develops various forms of creative design, computer graphics, production layout and marketing support.
• Creates and revises print and multimedia collateral to reflect the current brand look
• Manages the look and feel, concept, visual development and final execution of all design directions.
• Partners with Marketing managers and related operational departments as part of a project team providing design, conceptualization and solutions pertaining to deliverables.
• Maintains familiarity with customer demographics and develops an appropriate look and feel for all promotion and event related collateral.
• Monitors the progress of all projects. Provides continuous communication to the Marketing and/or Project team regarding ongoing projects and status updates.
• Executes various aspects of production including scanning, digital retouching, image editing, special effects, file manipulation and layout.
• Troubleshoots digital production issues as needed.
• Maintains project files and archives.

Additional Responsibilities
• Provides support for escalated support needs via telephone and email and ensures proper resolution of each, including direct contact with stakeholders when necessary. Responds to and handles problems and complaints.
• Manages the communication of trends via prepared reports to the appropriate personnel, as well as corporate headquarters and other service centers.
• Performs other reasonable requests by management which the associate is capable of performing.


W Hotels’ mission is to Ignite Curiosity, Expand Worlds. We are a place to experience life. We’re here to open doors and open minds. We are constantly inspired by new faces and new experiences. A tuned-in, up-for-anything spirit is at our core and has made us renowned for reinventing the norms of luxury around the globe. Whatever/Whenever is our culture and service philosophy that brings our guests’ passions to life. If you are original, innovative, and always looking towards the future of what’s possible, welcome to W Hotels. In joining W Hotels, you join a portfolio of brands with Marriott International. Be where you can do your best work, begin your purpose, belong to an amazing global team, and become the best version of you.

title: Application Designer - Lead UX Designer
company_info: PALO IT is a global innovation consultancy specialised in human-centered design, Agile software development and in the AI-driven transformation of large, forward-thinking companies. As a community of innovators, designers and technologists, we are committed to helping businesses embrace tech as a force for good. We work with clients to rapidly launch products and services, create new business models, and prepare leadership and culture for the future. Started in Paris in 2009 and with offices across five continents, we are proud to be a B-Corp certified company in Singapore (the first tech company to do so!) and Hong Kong, and working towards certification across all other locations. To further our vision of bringing positive change to better our world, we are looking for a new team member to join our exciting team in Singapore. At PALO IT, your happiness is our success. People are the heart of our organisation and the centre of everything we do. We constantly strive to provide the best employee experience, as well as cultivate a diverse, inclusive and multicultural work environment, with many opportunities where you grow professionally and personally.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
WHO WE ARE:
PALO IT is a global innovation consultancy and Agile software development company dedicated to helping organizations embrace tech as a force for good. We work with clients to rapidly launch products and services, create new business models, and prepare leadership and culture for the future. We are a community of innovators, designers and technologists across 11 offices and five continents (France, Hong Kong, Singapore, Thailand, Australia, Mexico and Colombia).
We're committed to helping businesses transform to better our world. We're proud to be a World Economic Forum (WEF) New Champion, and a B Corp-certified company in Singapore and Hong Kong, currently working towards certification across all other locations.

YOUR ROLE:
You should be able to oversee the full spectrum of design and development challenges and partner with PMs, engineers, researchers and content strategists to oversee the user experience of a product from conception to launch.

YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES:
Take care of the team of designers, know their strengths and weakness while encouraging them to grow on their individual paths;
Drive excellence in our design and strategy process, competent in leading a UX project on multiple fronts:Focus on solving business problems from the user’s point of view, balance business needs with user centered design.
Select the most adequate methodology, conduct design research and derive key insights for inspiration and change.
Visualize, design and conceptualize the user experience.
Create detailed wireframes along with defining interaction specifications. Comfortable with building prototypes and using them in a user centered design research process.
Communicate well and handle key business stakeholdersPresent concepts and UX solutions, winning clients’ trust and buy-in.
Facilitates workshops in order to gather business requirements, align the team, or to come up with innovative ideas depending on the context.
Assist in the company’s new business generation processes.
Have a keen eye for forefront technology and latest industry landscape
WHO YOU ARE:
You have proven experience in a similar position and you are passionate about new technologies, digital innovation and design. You have already worked in an Agile environment driven by Time-To-Market, you communicate easily, are independent and able to make significant proposals. Entrepreneurial/wild spirit combined with corporate know-how.

Entrepreneurship & intrapreneurship

You’ll take MONOKEI’s visual identity to the next level, conceptualising new approaches in digital graphics and packaging. As a graphic designer, you’ll help MONOKEI communicate the mission to bring good things for everyone through digital and print spaces.

i. Roles and responsibilities:
Responsibilities may include but are not limited to:
Collaborate with Product, Design and Web teams to create new and exciting experiences. Conceptualise creative development through print and digital graphics. Work across disciplines with external vendors while ensuring brand coherence.
‍

Have 1-3+ years of design / agency experience or equivalent.
Have a degree in Art/Graphic Design or equivalent subjects.
Have experience in graphic design, advertising, and social media.
Have excellent design and conceptual skills.
Not afraid to contribute to the design direction of a team.
Are passionate about design while being aware of current trends and tools have deep knowledge of the creative development process including starting projects, providing timely feedback and updates and completing work on schedule.

Are proficient in design software used in the design process, including Figma, Illustrator, and Photoshop. Print or packaging experience is a plus.

Preferably based in Kuala Lumpur / Singapore but open to remote applicants
‍
MONOKEI believes in making good things; products that are used on desks and in homes of many folks. We believe in making better input devices, that everyone wants to experience work/play/live through the objects we create. At MONOKEI, we’re interested in making the human and digital connection a little more warm, one keystroke at a time.
‍
In addition to base salary, we offer all employees:
Flexible vacation policy
Reasonable, non-crazy work hours
Staff discount on MONOKEI products
‍
Almost...
Feel like you're really close to being a perfect fit for us? Perhaps you're not feeling too confident despite having incredible skills? We encourage you to still apply! At MONOKEI, we're just a bunch of imperfect people trying to do cool things together.
‍
Interested?
Please email us at people (at) monokei (dot) co with your CV and a link or PDF of your portfolio. Positions will remain available until they're removed from this page. We will only contact shortlisted applicants.

title: Graphic Designer
company_info: Starting a new company is always a challenge. However, nothing builds a services company better than understanding clients’ needs and requirements, and fulfilling them right on time, on target with value-for-money quality product that goes above and beyond expectation. Such is not a myth but a reality for JAD Solutions Pte Ltd: a Mechanical and Electrical Engineering company that focuses on the healthcare profession, bio-medical industry and petrochemical research facilities from providing consultancy, integration of components, installation, testing, commissioning and the final accreditation process. Started by Mr Damiian Lee in 2007 and initially established as a one-man operation located at Cecil Street, it started as a dealer for BONPET automatic fire-extinguishers. Year 2009 saw its metamorphosis as it is now: an enterprise that specialises in multi-discipline environmental control solutions that include products and vast range of services such as installation and construction in laboratory, hospital isolation & protection ward design & construction, turnkey projects for chemical, biological and vivarium laboratory up to bio-safety level 3, testing and commissioning of laboratory facilities, laboratory ACMV & controls maintenance, amongst others. Beginning in a mere 300 square feet premise, the young company has since outgrown its previous compound and moved its business to a new location, currently housing both the expanded operations and increased manpower of over 60 staff. What sets JAD Solutions apart from the others in the industry, and thus convincing potential clients with an impeccable impression, is their quality after-sales service and on schedule delivery. Their ability to craft unique loyalty programmes, thus catering to their specific customers’ profiles, which includes maintenance and updating services that use the latest technology and processes with continuous research and development programmes puts them on par with industrial players in the international arena. This in turn builds customers’ faith and trust in the company, allowing them to provide professional and expert advice to their clients, creating a positive circle. In its quest to be the leader as an agent in the critical environment installation industry of international standards, harnessing innovative ideas in products and designs, JAD Solutions sees itself focusing on expanding their establishment by building a firm foundation for the business framework and then growing their products and services in the near future. However, through Damiian’s commitment and dedication, the company is set to be the trailblazer with its innovative products and cutting edge designs.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Job Scope

Catalogue Design: Develop eye-catching product catalogues that showcase our offerings, ensuring a consistent and visually appealing design that aligns with the brand identity.
GUI Design: Create intuitive and aesthetically pleasing user interfaces for software applications, websites, and other digital platforms, focusing on user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) best practices.
Certification Documents: Design and format certification documents, ensuring clarity, accuracy, and adherence to industry standards and branding guidelines.
Marketing Collateral: Produce marketing materials such as brochures, flyers, posters, and banners that effectively communicate key messages and engage target audiences.
Visual Branding: Collaborate with the marketing team to maintain and evolve the visual identity of the brand, ensuring consistency across all design materials.
Typography and Layout: Select appropriate fonts, layouts, and color schemes to create visually appealing and readable content.
Image Editing: Edit and enhance images for use in various design projects, ensuring they meet quality standards and align with the overall design concept.
Print and Digital Media: Adapt designs for both print and digital media, considering different formats, resolutions, and color profiles as needed.
Content Creation: Assist in generating creative and original content ideas for marketing campaigns and promotions.
Client Collaboration: Work closely with internal teams and clients to understand project requirements, gather feedback, and make necessary revisions to designs.
File Management: Organize and maintain design files, ensuring accessibility and version control.

Qualifications:

Bachelor's degree.
Proven experience in graphic design
Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (e.g., Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign).
Familiarity with user interface design principles and tools.
Strong attention to detail and the ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

Working Hours:
9am - 6pm : Mon to Fri
9am - 1pm : Sat

job_category: Advertising / Media, Design, Marketing / Public Relations
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Job Highlights:
Your designs will make a powerful impact!
Unleash your creativity and focus on driving results
Dive into an exhilarating range of cutting-edge design projects

Job Description:
Are you ready to take your graphic design career to the next level? We are seeking a talented, motivated, and results-focused Senior Graphic Designer to join our dynamic team.

You will play a key role in developing marketing materials that produce outstanding Return-on-Investment (ROI). Your work will be rigorously A/B tested to identify the most effective designs. Get ready for a thrilling ride as you work directly with senior management to craft marketing that will drive our sales and growth.

Responsibilities:
1. Collaborate directly with senior management, crafting effective marketing materials that propel our brand's success.
2. Unleash your artistic prowess and create visually stunning designs for various marketing channels, including print, digital, and social media.
3. Harness the power of design principles and marketing strategies to activate our target audience.
4. Conduct rigorous A/B testing to uncover design gold mines and optimize marketing materials for maximum impact.
5. Engage with cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and product, to understand project requirements and deliver designs that exceed expectations.
6. Be at the forefront of industry trends, bringing innovative ideas and cutting-edge approaches to the table.
7. Juggle multiple design projects like a pro, prioritizing tasks and delivering high-quality work on time.
8. Inspire and mentor junior designers, nurturing their talent and helping them soar to new heights.

Requirements:
1. Diploma or Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Visual Communication, or a related field.
2. At least 2 years of proven experience as a graphic designer, preferably in a senior or lead role.
3. Master of industry-standard design software, including Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, etc.).
4. Strong understanding of design principles, typography, color theory, and layout techniques.
5. Willingness to make an impact and burning desire to make your work matter.

Join our fiery and collaborative work environment where your creativity will be celebrated and your designs will set the world on fire. If you're ready to make a blazing impact on our marketing efforts, we can't wait to hear from you.

To apply, ignite our curiosity by submitting your resume, portfolio, and an electrifying cover letter showcasing why you are the ideal candidate for this thrilling role. Let's set the design world ablaze together!

description:
Roles & Responsibilities
COMPANY DESCRIPTION
As Singapore’s leading supermarket retail player and a household name close to all, we have grown with you over the years. It is now your turn to grow an exciting new career and fulfil your aspirations with us. Join us as we embark on a journey to make lives better for our customers, community, environment and employees.
At NTUC FairPrice, we offer you more than just a job. We are committed in giving our employees a rewarding career through comprehensive development opportunities. We promise a wonderful workplace culture with ample opportunities for growth at different levels of your career. Every of our 10,000 employees across Singapore is important.
If the prospect of working in an organization at the forefront of retail technology and innovation excites you, look no further.
Grow your career with us today and make a difference.
.
RESPONSIBILITIES
You will lead a multi-disciplinary design team for the mission-focused FairPrice Group (social enterprise) with the Food Services/Cooked Food business unit. You will work on exciting growth brands such as Kopitiam Food Hall, Kopitiam Corner, Heavenly Wang Cafe, Foodfare B2B, Food Folks @ Lau Pa Sat monument, and many others across Hawker Centers, Coffee Shops, and Food Courts. Our mission is to serve Singaporeans with quality food at affordable prices and be spaces where Singaporeans can have enjoyable food experiences with their family and friends.
We will work closely with a dynamic marketing team in areas of in-store and online digital advertising communications, point of sales key visuals, and social media, and be involved in the development of in-store concept designs as well as new food brands (packaging, menus, uniform, merchandise, and F&B brand guides). We are looking for someone who loves a challenge in a fast-paced F&B environment working with food and delighting customers in their daily lives.
You are also required to take creative briefs from various stakeholders and manage a robust stream of work and allocate resources efficiently across the design team. 
Key Responsibilities
Generate attention-grabbing creative concepts aligned with the brand's visual identity 
Produce storyboards, and mood boards to visualize ideas
Design fit for audience print and digital content aligned to the content strategy 
Project management to deliver multi-format content assets within deadlines
Present completed ideas to internal and external stakeholders 
Attuned to consumer trends and design aesthetic
QUALIFICATIONS
Job Requirements
Minimum 5-8 years of relevant work experience in commercial graphic design
Experiences working in a creative or design agency and client (startup or F&B brands preferred)
Experience in designing for online and offline platforms 
Software skills: Adobe Suite especially Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, and After Effects
Ability to both work autonomously and as part of a team
Highly customer-focused, and able to work in a fast-paced environment
Motivated, meticulous and results-oriented
Good interpersonal and communication skills
Team player and ability to collaborate and work effectively with a variety of stakeholders
OTHER INFORMATION

Please note that your application will be sent to and reviewed by the direct employer - FairPrice

We are a solutions and engagement (relationship) management merit company for all your brand marketing, events, premiums, design and logistical needs.

Werks is seeking enthusiastic and creative individuals to join our team. Let us work with you in shaping an exciting and rewarding career path together!

We're in search of a Graphic Designer to assist us in design-related projects and support with our marketing needs. This role will involve collaborating on creative initiatives and contributing to our marketing efforts, making it a valuable position within our organization.

Duties and Responsibilities

· Understanding design briefs and defining requirements

Qualifications

While this profession welcomes applications from graduates and diploma holders of all backgrounds, the following fields are more closely aligned:
· Graphic/Digital Design
· Communication Design
· Digital Media/Multimedia Technology
· Visual Communication
· Or any related diploma/degree

Requirements

· Proficiency with Adobe Illustrator, InDesign, Photoshop
· Proficiency with Microsoft Excel, PowerPoint, Word
· A strong eye for visual composition and layout
· Effective time management skills
· Great interpersonal and communication skills, a good team player
· Great organisational skills and attention to detail

Additional requirements:

Werks Solutions is in search of candidates who have a passion for design and a strong commitment to continuous learning and personal growth. We offer flexible Work-From-Home arrangements and provide additional staff benefits as well.

Brandon Toi

Faridah Mohamed Fadzil

faridah@werkssolutions.com

company_info: The Write Connection (TWC) is a premier MOE-registered English enrichment brand that specialises in the teaching of English, writing and thinking skills. Since our establishment in 2012, our highly-effective online and physical lessons have helped more than 15,000 children and youths achieve their dream grades. At TWC, our students enjoy and excel in English with our world-class lessons and exceptional pedagogy. With many success stories behind us, we strive to lead generations of students to become confident and effective users of the English language. Today, TWC has 10 centres across Singapore at Bedok, Bishan, Bukit Timah, Jurong Gateway, Parkway Parade, Punggol Plaza, Sembawang Road, Tampines, Toa Payoh and Woodlands. description:
Roles & Responsibilities
The Write Connection is a premier education company in Singapore. We are looking for a graphic designer to support our illustration and design needs by joining our Marketing Team.

Job Responsibilities
Design attractive decals, posters, brochures, websites, animated video reels, social media graphics, and other collateral for all relevant platforms to boost online and offline engagement and help in effective customer acquisition.
Create design collaterals that adhere to design guidelines for each brand under TWC Group.
Illustrate worksheets, learning materials, and other TWC collaterals and publications for the Curriculum Team or Teaching Service Quality Team.
Create lesson slides, games, and activities for various levels and programs.
Conceptualise, capture and edit photographs for branding and marketing purposes, such as professional portraits and event photography.
Handle both in-house and external printing, ordering of design collaterals, and other logistical aspects for graphic design and marketing matters.
Assist in in-centre branding projects to ensure the centres and office spaces look presentable, premium, and on-brand to both customers and staff members.
Stay up to date with industry trends, the latest design techniques, and software to keep ahead of competitors and produce top-notch work.
Assist in planning and organising company events.
Assist in designing and creating corporate collaterals, notices, and slides.
Other associated duties.
Job Requirements
Possess at least a Diploma in Design, Visual Communications, or a similar discipline.
Ability to draw (hand sketch) to effectively illustrate learning materials.
Able to work efficiently to meet tight deadlines, organise time well, and work with minimum supervision.
Proficient in design software: Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign, and After Effects.
Knowledge of Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Lightroom, HTML/CSS would be favourable.
Technically savvy and/or fast learner of technology.
Comfortable using the Mac platform.
Possess excellent communication skills to work with stakeholders and ensure that works meet requirements, desired quality, and expected timelines.
Photography and videography knowledge are considered advantages.
Work Hours and Location:
Work Hours: Monday to Friday (9:30 am to 6:30 pm).
Work Location: TWC HQ, Guthrie House, Bukit Timah.
Note to Applicant:
Please state your expected salary. Salary is commensurate with experience and qualifications.
Send your Cover Letter, CV, and design and illustration portfolio to Recruitment@TheWriteConnection.com.sg

title: Graphic Designer (Bilingual)

description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Job Description
Bridges M&C is a regional medical and healthcare communications agency. Our clients include blue-chip medical device, pharmaceutical, med and health tech companies, and private clinics and hospital groups. We are headquartered in Singapore, with an office in Malaysia and partners across ASEAN and the Asia-Pacific. We are seeking a versatile Graphic Designer to join our dynamic team. Collaborating with our creative director and writers, you will play a crucial role in creating visually appealing content in English and Mandarin.

Responsibilities:
1. Design & visual content creation: Create compelling visuals for presentations, print and digital campaigns, and digital platforms such as social media and websites.
2. Branding: Adhere to relevant branding guidelines for each campaign, ensuring consistency across all materials.
3. Collaboration: Work closely with the team to understand their needs and translate concepts into engaging visual content.
4. Adaptability: Stay updated with design trends and industry best practices, adapting designs to suit requirements of the medical and healthcare industries and their target audiences.
5. Software proficiency: Proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign) to create high-quality designs.
6. Timeliness: Ability to meet deadlines
7. Confidentiality: Ability to handle sensitive and confidential information
8. Language skills: While major translation projects will be undertaken by third-party translation houses, you may be required to provide basic translation support from Mandarin to English and vice versa, especially when communicating to team members and clients who are non-Mandarin speakers.
9. Events: When required, to assist with client-servicing and in-person events.
Essential Requirements:
1. At least 3 years’ proven experience in graphic design, with a portfolio showcasing your work. Have a good understanding of design and how it works to enhance content.
2. Proficiency in graphic design software, particularly Adobe Creative Suite.
3. Self-motivated, an eye for detail, thorough, able to spot and correct typos, design inconsistencies, etc.
4. Able to work collaboratively and meet project deadlines.
5. Excellent communication skills and openness to receiving feedback.
6. Proficiency in spoken and written English and Mandarin is essential.
7. Strong time management skills.
8. Must be legal to work in Singapore

This position offers a unique opportunity to apply your graphic design skills in the dynamic field of medical and healthcare communications. If you are a creative, self-motivated, and detail-oriented team player, we encourage you to apply.

For more information about us, please visit our website: https://www.bridges-comms.com

We look forward to hearing from you!

Knowledge of industry trends and best practices in design and production.

company_info: ZujuGP is a football community platform that focuses on bridging the worlds between fans, businesses, and ecosystems to allow for the immediacy of creation and sharing of content, experiences, and memories. description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Minimum Qualification:
Proficiency in design software, including Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign) and Figma.
Fundamental knowledge of layout design, typography, and color theory.
Ability to work autonomously within deadlines.
Proven ability to balance and execute on multiple priorities in parallel.
Preferred Qualification:
Prior internship or relevant work experience in a start-up or scale-up environment.
Advanced skills in motion graphics and animation.
Familiarity with UI/UX design principles.
Experience in creating designs for multiple platforms, including digital, and social media.
Interest and knowledge in football with an understanding of the related visual narratives and brand aesthetics.
About the Job:
As our Graphic Designer, you'll be an essential creative force within our team, driving the development of innovative ideas into captivating designs that stir the excitement and passion inherent in spectator sports, with a particular emphasis on football.
Embrace the thrill and dynamism of the spectator sports world, and specifically football, where each match unfolds a unique narrative and presents fresh challenges to creatively interpret.
We're in search of a creative who has a deep understanding of visual communication, exceptional design skills, and an unerring eye for detail. If you're keen to immerse yourself in a lively, fast-paced work environment and make a lasting impact on the world of spectator sports, we're looking forward to your application.
Responsibilities:
Utilize your proficiency in Adobe Illustrator, InDesign, Photoshop, and Figma to develop visually compelling football-themed content. Expertise in motion graphic design, photography, typography, or web layout design will offer a considerable advantage.
Channel your creative aptitude and innovative approach to understand our football-focused target audience, producing designs that resonate profoundly with them.
Grasp and manifest our brand, its vision, and its values within the football sphere, effectively translating them into visual narratives through graphic design and storytelling.
Plan and implement a strategic approach for creating and posting football-centric content across our diverse social media platforms, including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, TikTok, and YouTube.
Display the capability to envision, foster, and deliver innovative and engaging creative concepts centered around football, to stimulate dialogue and encourage affinity.
Collaborate effectively with the team to deepen the understanding of the creative brief, gain insights into the specifics of our football-oriented target audience, ensuring the delivery of relevant and consistent interactive creative solutions in the spectator sports domain.

title: GRAPHIC DESIGNER / 3D
company_info: KIN PRODUCTIONS PTE. LTD. Kin is a holistic experiential agency that provides a diverse set of services for the experience -creation industry. Our services include events, venue overlays, creative conceptualization and development, design & build, production, logistics, operations and furnishing. Join our professional team behind the success of world leading sports events. You will also learn to fit together to create a cohesive and impactful experience for the audience and the opportunity to work across a variety of projects from different sectors including retail, hospitality and entertainment.
job_category: Architecture / Interior Design, Design, Events / Promotions
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
KIN is a dynamic and innovative experiential events management company specialising in creating immersive and captivating experiences for a diverse range of clients. We are seeking a talented Graphic Designer with 3D experience to join our team, who can bring creative visions to life for events, interior design, and exhibition projects. If you have a passion for turning concepts into reality and enjoy working with a variety of projects and thrive in a collaborative, fast paced environment, we want to hear from you.
Job Description

As a Graphic Designer in KIN, you will play a crucial role in conceptualizing, designing and visualizing event spaces, interior designs and exhibition booths. You will work closely with our inhouse creative team to transform ideas into compelling 3D visualizations and graphics that captivate the hearts of our clients and event audience.
Responsibilities

· Collaboration: Collaborate closely with Project Managers, clients and other stakeholders to ensure seamless
execution of design projects.
· Client Interaction: Understand clients requirements, present design concepts to obtain buy-in, accommodate
feedback and make revisions as necessary to meet clients expectations
· Project Management: Manage multiple design projects simultaneously, adhering to project timelines and
budget
· Graphic Design: Design and produce graphics, signages, and marketing collaterals for events and exhibitions
complying to Client’s branding guides
· Visualization: Produce photorealistic 3D visualisations to present design concepts that are client winning
· 3D Modelling: Create detailed 3D models of event spaces, interior designs, and exhibition booths using
software such as AutoCAD, SketchUp, or similar tools.

Qualifications:·
Bachelor's degree or Professional certification in Graphic Design, Interior Design, Architecture, or a related field.
Proven experience in 3D modelling and rendering for events, interior design, or exhibitions (portfolio required).
Proficiency in 3D software such as AutoCAD, SketchUp, 3ds Max, or similar.
Strong graphic design skills with proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign).
Excellent attention to detail and the ability to work in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.
Good communication and presentation skills.
Collaborative mindset and ability to work effectively in a team.
Office Location : TAI SENG

title: Marketing Graphic Design Intern
company_info: PALO IT is a global innovation consultancy specialised in human-centered design, Agile software development and in the AI-driven transformation of large, forward-thinking companies. As a community of innovators, designers and technologists, we are committed to helping businesses embrace tech as a force for good. We work with clients to rapidly launch products and services, create new business models, and prepare leadership and culture for the future. Started in Paris in 2009 and with offices across five continents, we are proud to be a B-Corp certified company in Singapore (the first tech company to do so!) and Hong Kong, and working towards certification across all other locations. To further our vision of bringing positive change to better our world, we are looking for a new team member to join our exciting team in Singapore. At PALO IT, your happiness is our success. People are the heart of our organisation and the centre of everything we do. We constantly strive to provide the best employee experience, as well as cultivate a diverse, inclusive and multicultural work environment, with many opportunities where you grow professionally and personally.
job_category: Design, Information Technology, Marketing / Public Relations
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
About Us
PALO IT is an innovation & agile development company. From Design Research to DevOps, we are in the business of end-to-end development of breakthrough digital experiences. As a community of innovators and developers, we also aim at renewing the way organizations operate, promoting sustainable business agility, user-centricity and open collaboration while having fun doing it.
Started in Paris in 2009 and with offices in Singapore, Sydney, Hong Kong, Bangkok and Mexico, we are looking for our next superstar to join our exciting team in Singapore.
At PALO IT, our employees are not widgets. They are in the center of all our projects and successes. We offer an exciting and creative working environment, with endless opportunities to develop your skills, travel and take your career to the next level. Get in touch to find out more!
Our Vision and Values
We aspire to positively impact the world by empowering organizations to harness the power of transformative technology for the greater good.
We care about our World
We act with Courage
We Share, it’s in our DNA
We choose Positivity
We Deliver Awesomeness
Your Profile & Role
YOU:
Thrive on challenge. When was the last time you failed?
Are curious & always learning. What are you up to right now?
Can deal with constant change. When were you last surprised?
Have mastered at least one skill of your trade but you’re not defined by it. What can you teach us? Can you wear many hats?
YOU AGAIN:
Know all the ins and outs of Adobe Creative Suite/InDesign and MS Office. Highly proficient in Design Illustrator, Photoshop
Ability to create motion graphics with the use of Adobe After Effects
Creative and a strong flair for graphic design, meticulous with a keen eye for
Familiar with social media content creations
Bonus if have experience with B2B tech companies and martech tools like Hubspot
Ability to work with deadlines and multiple on-going projects. Well organized and good with timelines
YOUR ROLE:
Design interactive landing pages, and other creative content for sales and marketing usage
Assist in the planning and strategizing of campaigns surrounding email and social channels
Propose design solutions to best communicate marketing objectives
Ensure high quality deliverables and consistency in brand visuals
To cater for all digital aspects designs for our land pages and other social media platforms/posting
Any other assignments as delegated from time to time
Position is based in Singapore for 3 months

We might not be able to get back to every applicant but we promise your application will be reviewed by one of our recruitment experts.

title: Graphics and Experience Designer
company_info: Design Business Chamber Singapore (DBCS) is the nation’s leading multidisciplinary design chamber since 1985 DBCS’ vision is to establish a community of practice that embraces design-led innovation as a key driver for sustainable growth. We do so by forging partnership opportunities between the design and business communities. In the recent years, we incorporated the tagline – Better Business by Design – as our manifesto in advocating the application of design thinking in business. Our ultimate aim is to rally businesses and communities to not just achieve Better Business by Design but to use design for social good. Founded in 1985 by a diverse group of forward-thinking designers, we were formerly known as the Designers Association Singapore and were renamed to Design Business Chamber Singapore in 2012.

description:
Roles & Responsibilities
About the Role
We are seeking a creative professional in the field of graphic design, social media, and UI/UX to join the chamber. You have a strong command of visual and communication design. You can communicate the underlying concepts and narratives to those around you. You will work alongside stalwarts of the design community and senior industry leaders across disciplines, in a collaborative environment where you will thrive and grow.
If you would like to play a part in shaping the future of design in Singapore and be a strong voice for the community, we want to hear from you.

Able to effectively manage multiple projects in a fast-paced environment

title: UIUX Designer
company_info: YouApp is a technology company that harnesses Artificial Intelligence (AI) for matching, generative content, chats, sentiment & predictive analysis and many more. We use AI as the backbone of our platform. At YouApp.ai, we match like-minded people who share similar interests, passions, and skills, providing a unique and personalized experience for our users. Our team is made up of people from diverse backgrounds and experiences, united by a common goal of connecting people in a meaningful way. We value innovation, creativity, and teamwork, and we are committed to creating a work environment that fosters growth and development. Download and try our app at our website: https://youapp.ai
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
As the UIUX Designer, you will be responsible for translating user stories and business requirements into effective designs. You will deliver UI prototypes, wireframes, and detailed design specifications to communicate designs, based on user needs, tasks, and product requirements. In this role, you will collaborate with engineers and other UX team members to improve existing product functionality based on user research, while adhering to consistency in design according to guidelines.
Responsibilities
Translate user stories and business requirements into effective designs.
Deliver UI prototypes, wireframes, and detailed design specifications to communicate designs, around a well-defined nucleus of user needs, tasks, customer and product requirements.
Adhere and drive consistency in design of the solution, approach, and methodology, according to guidelines.
Collaborate with engineers and other UX team members on designs.
Improve existing product functionality based on user research, working iteratively with the team.
Investigating user experience design requirements for our suite of digital assets.
Developing and conceptualising a comprehensive UI/UX design strategy for the brand.
Producing high quality UX design solutions through wireframes, visual and graphic designs, flow diagrams, storyboards, site maps, and prototypes.
Testing UX elements such as CTAs, banners, page layouts, page designs, page flows, and target links for landing pages.
Testing success and error flows ensuring all cases are fulfilled
Work with testers to document test cases
Collaborating with the design, product, marketing and relevant teams spanning multiple countries internally and externally across multiple countries and languages to ensure the creation and delivery of tailored experiences for the user.
Always learning new UI/UX or design tools and trends to stay competitive.
Constantly improving all digital facing user interfaces and experiences of assigned projects.
Requirements
More than 3 years of experience in UIUX for production websites, apps, and dapps
Expert in Figma
Good knowledge of UI, Website, Dapp, Android, iOS principles
Must be proficient with vector graphics.
Knowledge of animation development using Adobe After Effects is a plus.
Knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript is a plus.
Familiar with the blockchain and mobile apps industry.
Spoken and written proficiency in English
If you feel like you might be a good fit, drop us an email at career@youapp.ai

company_info: Established in 2013, IPrint Express Pte Ltd is your best choice to Express and Quality printing services in Singapore. We are a team of dedicated professionals with years of trusted experience in printing on many different medias and formats to suit a variety of personal and corporate projects. Our E-commerce website was established in 2015 and it was one of the first few E-commerce websites in Singapore that offered customers a convenient means to place their print orders online and arrange for a self-collection or delivery. We are proud of our achievement in being able to easily reach out to the locals in Singapore and provide them with all their printing needs. Likewise, we are also able to extend beyond our borders to overseas customers from regional countries such as Hong Kong, Japan and even in international regions like Europe, Australia and more. Customers that travelled to Singapore for events or functions could utilize our indispensable platform to place their orders online. The items can then be confirmed and arranged to be printed, delivered and ready at the hotel in time for their events. This was an invaluable and one-of-a-kind service at the time and remains so to this day. However, we did not stop there and we are constantly seeking ways to evolve and improve our printing services. We use the latest in high production range machines to produce high quality printing with metallic gold and silver ink. We pride ourselves in offering an array of finishing options such as lamination, customizable die-cut, booklet binding and more. We have also expanded to include ourselves as providers of Display Stands and Installation services. Gradually adding on Personalized printing services, such as direct mailing and variable data printing, where we can print addresses or customize greetings to your prints and facilitate postage to target residential or business areas. We also include Brand design in our repertoire of services where we help customers reshape or recreate logos to get them started in building the foundation of their personal or corporate brand and identity. In year 2021, our new website has been redesigned to a more versatile, powerful and modern format. It remains at its core, a convenient and accessible platform to upload your files, place your orders or request for quotations efficiently. Information on the materials, products, finishing, guidelines and many more services that we offer are now made readily available and presented in a concise manner. This has been done to assist all our customers in getting the right information they need to make the right purchase for your projects. Our goals has always been to be able to provide all customers with Express, Convenient and Quality printing services. We are passionate about providing you a hassle-free experience from ordering to printing. We are located in the heart of the East and if you have any questions, simply let us know and we can be of assistance.

description:
Roles & Responsibilities
At SJ Digital Media, we see graphic design as visual storytelling that engages, informs, and inspires. We're looking for a talented graphic designer who can take concepts and ideas and create visual representations, in both print and electronic media. The ideal candidate will have expert knowledge of current design software and be skilled in every step of the design process, from concept to final deliverable. Collaborating with multiple team members across the company, the graphic designer should be able to take written or spoken ideas and convert them into a design that connects. The successful candidate will have a thorough understanding of branding and marketing, and be able to find the right style and layout for every project.
Objectives of this role
Work on a wide range of projects and media, using various software programs including Adobe Suite, to visualize and develop innovative graphic designs that meet business goals
Obtain input from managers to ensure that designs meet organizational standards and brand expectations, express ideas accurately, and represent the company or client appropriately
Work independently as well as cooperatively with marketing team to meet deadlines, stay within budget, and schedule project implementation based on workload, which may include five or more simultaneous projects
Examine existing processes, identify flaws, and create solutions that improve design capabilities
Update and maintain internal databases for designs, photography, and video
Responsibilities
Collaborate, brainstorm, and strategize with multiple teams or clients on a wide range of materials that may include web pages, presentations, marketing collateral, signage, internal communications, newsletters, and marketing materials
Translate strategic direction into high-quality design within an established brand identity
Develop concepts by hand or with software, and execute original content by determining the ideal usage of color, text, font style, imagery, and layout
Manage the design and uploading process for all project materials, based on best practices for using a content management system
Use trend intelligence and knowledge of historical and current markets when designing and executing specific classifications
Required skills and qualifications
Exceptional creativity and innovative design skills
Proficiency in design software, including Illustrator, InDesign, Photoshop, Dreamweaver
Excellent communication and presentation skills
Organizational and time-management skills for meeting deadlines in a fast-paced environment
Desire to continue building skill set with education and training
Preferred skills and qualifications
Min. Diploma in graphic design, art, or related discipline
Proficiency in Adobe ID, PSD, AI and preferably AE
Knowledge of WiX and content management systems
Photography experience and proficiency with photo-editing software

title: Motion Graphics Designer
company_info: Zouk Group is a global lifestyle company with establishments across the nightlife, entertainment, and dining sectors. Its namesake, Zouk, is a 31-year-old nightlife brand known for pushing the boundaries of dance music and propelling Singapore on the global map. Ranked Asia’s best club on DJ Mag’s annual Top 100 Clubs list since 2017 and top globally since 2010, Zouk is Singapore’s foremost clubbing institution, delivering the freshest in dance music across genres, state-of-the-art sound and lighting systems, a constant roster of stellar international, regional and local residents, and top-notch service and hospitality. Zouk has since evolved into an all-encompassing global lifestyle brand that has expanded into the food & beverage sector with new brands like social gaming bar RedTail, vibe dining restaurant Ichizuke, and more concepts in the pipeline. Aside from club offerings, Zouk Group also owns ZoukOut, Asia’s premier dawn-to-dusk music festival featuring world-class DJs, attracting a cosmopolitan mix of locals and tourists within and beyond Asia to the beachfront of Singapore. Zouk Group now oversees all club and lifestyle entities in Singapore, Genting Highlands in Malaysia, on board Genting-owned cruise ships, and the ambitious and immersive entertainment and lifestyle concept — Zouk Las Vegas. The company also owns the franchise to Five Guys in Singapore and Malaysia.

Roles & Responsibilities
Overall responsible for the translation of user needs and business requirements into features and functionalities that enhances application experience. In doing so, develop process flows, wireframes, and prototypes to effectively conceptualize and communicate high-level design strategies as well as ensure a simple and efficient visual design.

Key Responsibilities:
UI/UX Design: Collaborate with product managers, developers and customers to conceptualize and design user-friendly interfaces that enhance user satisfaction and usability.
Graphic Design: Create visually appealing graphics, including marketing materials, web assets, and branding elements that align with our company's vision and message.
User Research: Conduct user research and gather feedback to inform design decisions and iterate on designs based on user insights.
Prototyping: Develop interactive prototypes and wireframes to visualize and communicate design concepts effectively.
Design Guidelines: Establish and maintain design guidelines and standards to ensure consistency across all products and platforms.
Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, product managers, and marketers, to bring design concepts to life.
Personality: possesses a sense of adaptability, leadership, pro-activeness, punctuality, and ownership. Be detail-oriented, firm and persuasive, and resilient to conflicting demands. Good interpersonal skills and ability to work under pressure. Adopt a positive attitude towards learning and development.

Qualifications:
Proven experience in UI/UX design, with a strong portfolio showcasing your design skills.

Strong understanding of user-centered design principles and responsive web design.
Excellent visual design skills, including typography, color theory, and layout.
Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced, agile environment.
Strong communication and problem-solving skills.

Illustrates concept by designing rough layout of art and copy regarding arrangement, size, type size and style, and related aesthetic concepts

Any other ad-hoc duties

Minimum Diploma in Art/Product/Creative Design and related subjects
At least 3 to 5 years’ of work experience in retail beauty or consumer industry
Proficient in software such as Adobe Illustrator, InDesign, Photoshop, Adobe Dimension or 3D software, After Effects, PDF, Microsoft Office and knowledge of digital pre-press and print production processes
Strong portfolio of design work
Demonstrate strong organization skills in order to juggle multiple projects at the same time
Excellent communication skill(s) and projects timeline management
Good time management, work flow and schedule in order to meet strict and sometimes aggressive deadlines
Able to focus, with a keen attention to details
Able to solve problem and find multiple design solutions, especially under narrow parameters or strict budget restraints

Able to collaborate with other members of the Graphic Design team and effectively communicates their own ideas
Self-driven, proactive team player. Creative and have an eye for shape and colour
