title: Designer / Senior Designer
company_info: antics@play is a brand and PR agency that deliver marketing results and chart new grounds for clients and ourselves. We are brand-led, strategy-driven, process-oriented, and play-inspired. Always. Believing that play stimulates creativity and is an important tool for problem solving, we ground the development of each project on our playbook, a strategic blueprint that uses play-based methodologies in our exploration, discovery and creative ideation. The results are unexpected business insights, inspired creativity and unique brand solutions that move many clients and partners to push farther, reach higher and love what they do. If it’s not play, it’s not work.
job_category: Advertising / Media, Design, Marketing / Public Relations
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
You are not just a designer and you will not be treated as just a designer. You’re a Creative. You want to create. You want to take an active steer. You’re tenacious in achieving creative and client satisfaction. You want to learn and share what you’ve learned. You want to try things on for size. Or do things just for fun. You want to dream and imagine. And get paid doing it. Sounds like you?

As Designer/Senior Designer, you will play an active hands-on role in key projects. Working closely with other players in the creative, ops and account servicing team, you will steer client and agency jobs toward the best creative outcome, and owning it.

Core Responsibilities
Conjure magic from creative briefs
Propose kickass concepts founded on research and inspiration
Design brands and campaigns that get people excited
Design experiences (digital, print, video, experiences) guided by your own firm art direction
Present your masterpieces confidently and persuasively
Prepare FA and production supervision as sometimes needed …and some menial tasks
Qualifications, Skills & Experiences Required
Knowledge of 3–4 creative disciplines to produce compelling and cohesive ATL, BTL and digital work under broad direction
Expertise in Adobe CC, Microsoft Office and productivity software like Teamgantt and Teams
Proficiency in digital a must (website, mobile, UX/UI design)
Proficiency in motion and/or environmental design an advantage
Strong storytelling ability non-negotiable
Ability to present and facilitate brainstorming sessions with some flair and showmanship
More than 5 years of graphic design experience
A monkey brain brimming with too much ideas, matched by a left brain that can critically organise them into thoughts
Insatiably curious and open mind to learn new skills, creative processes and styles to continuously grow as a creative
Ability to have fun but can also hunker down and get stuff done
Other table stakes, like team player, communication skills, self-starter, time management, etc.
Your application will get our attention also if you can:
Show us your passion in branding and advertising
Convince us you can work in a team
Show us you are an unstoppable ideas machine
Make us laugh
To apply, please mail to hi@anticsatplay.com with
1. CV
2. Current and expected remuneration package
3. Earliest date of availability
4. Work samples / body of works

title: Designer
company_info: ThinkPlace is a pre-eminent strategy, design, and innovation consultancy. We work with government and industry to create vibrant societies, strong economies and sustainable environments. We think about the whole system; we search for stated and unstated needs; we involve users to generate solutions based on insight; we prototype possible solutions; and we build compelling futures. We are highly collaborative, and we thrive on cutting through complexity. We have offices in Australia, New Zealand, Singapore and Kenya, and clients around the world. To find out more, visit www.thinkplaceglobal.com.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
About ThinkPlace
ThinkPlace is a leading strategy, design, and innovation consultancy that works worldwide to design a future that works for all. Since its establishment in 2005, ThinkPlace has grown into a global network of studios, spanning nine countries with over 120 employees.
As a global network of studios, we are dedicated to shifting the needle on the UN Sustainable
Development Goals and creating public value through design, striving towards vibrant communities, strong economies, sustainable environments, and trusted institutions.
We design with change leaders from the public sector, private sector, and the non-profit and
development sector. From our origins in designing for government, we are increasingly working with businesses that want to achieve impact at scale.
We have a strong core of expertise in collaborative human-centred design, digital transformation, and complex system innovation. We continue to add to our toolkit for design with emerging fields like behavioural insights and data analytics.
To learn more about us, visit www.thinkplaceglobal.com.
To achieve our goals, we need amazing people like you on our team.

We are looking for Designers to join our studio in Singapore. Any of the following specialties are encouraged to apply:
Design Researcher to work towards creating sustainable futures through evidence-based narratives. Background in Ethnography, Anthropology, Psychology, Sociology and/or related fields. Exposure to applying mixed methods approaches in research, analysis and report writing.
Business Designer to create strategic stories for the future. Background in Business, Commerce, Law and/or related fields. Exposure to business analytics, business model design and/or strategy development.
Digital Designer to prototype new futures into reality. Background in UX UI Design, Digital Service Design and/or related fields. Exposure to digital prototyping, usability testing, user research.
Visual Designer to visualise the future for minds and hearts. Background in Graphic Design, Arts and/or related fields. Exposure to visualising complex qualitative and quantitative data in beautiful and accessible ways, through visual design tools such as Indesign and Adobe Creative Suite.
Content Developer to capture and communicate the human impact of change. Background in Journalism, Media, Communications and/or related fields. Exposure to delivering content in a variety of digital and print mediums and varying contexts.
Designer with Industrial or Architecture background to turn powerful insights into product, services or strategic solutions which address some Singapore’s most complex challenges.
We believe that whoever will be joining us will have these core traits, found in every ThinkPlacer:
Integrity: You are unwaveringly ethical and have the highest integrity, placing emphasis on maintaining confidentiality and sensitivity in all your dealings, and on being a positive and optimistic contributor.
Passion: You are driven, enthusiastic and excited to apply a learning mindset to every challenge you face. You don’t fear ambiguity but thrive in collaborating within it.
Empathy: You seek to understand the perspectives of others and are caring and compassionate in your interactions. You are excited to share your unique skills and experience and learn from others.
Communication: You have excellent written and verbal communication skills, with an uncompromising eye for detail.
What is the key to this role?
You can work with our team to produce insightful, beautiful work to communicate complex research and designs. While we are open to different backgrounds, we need you to demonstrate three key things to us:
You can think critically about the world: You have an innate curiosity in the world and read up on topics that interest you. While you might not yet have a lot of experience, you’re interested to learn, and ask why. As a designer, you don’t just execute someone else’s brief. You can shape the brief for yourself and think through critical design decisions.
You can get creative: When the challenge is posed, you’re comfortable to throw some ideas out straight away, even if they’re lame to begin with. As you and the team get deeper into the process, you get excited as stronger concepts start to build as a result of your contributions. When we’re really pushing boundaries, you can be bold and wild in the suggestions you make.
You can get making fast: Talk is cheap. All that thinking needs to be quickly translated into something tangible, and you can rapidly bring ideas to life in a variety of mediums. You’re comfortable trying out new mediums and tools to produce prototypes. You’re a natural improviser.
Compensation:
$3500 - $4900 per month (ThinkPlace has a structured progression program tied to individual performance).
ThinkPlace offers 21 days annual leave per year. Evening or weekend work will occasionally be required.
How to apply:
Your application will need to include:
a short covering letter, telling us why you'd like to work with ThinkPlace (one-page max);
a resume/CV;
a portfolio of your favourite pieces of work;
Upload your application through this portal or email completed application to people@thinkplace.com.sg
For any questions, please email us at people@thinkplace.com.sg

title: Junior Graphic Designer
company: KANG SHI FU BEVERAGE SINGAPORE PTE. LTD.
company_info: 康师傅控股有限公司（「本公司」）及其附属公司（「本集团」）主要在中国从事生产和销售方便面及饮品。本集团于1992年开始生产方便面，并自1996年起扩大业务至方便食品及饮品；2012年3月，本集团进一步拓展饮料业务范围，完成与PepsiCo中国饮料业务之战略联盟，开始独家负责制造、灌装、包装、销售及分销PepsiCo于中国的非酒精饮料。目前本集团的主要产品，皆已在中国食品市场占有显著的市场地位。「康师傅」作为中国家喻户晓的品牌，经过多年的耕耘与积累，深受中国消费者喜爱和支持。 康师傅作为快消品行业的领导品牌，肩负引领行业食品安全与质量保障的使命，本集团不断构建和完善管理体系，建立风险预防管理机制，实施食品安全的全方位控制，确保产品质量与安全，为广大消费者提供安全、美味、健康的食品。 本集团不断完善遍布全国各地的销售网络，令新产品更加快速、有效地登陆市场，使得集团产品处于行业领先地位。截至2021年12月31日，本集团共拥有340个营业所及341个仓库以服务80,726家经销商及256,567家直营零售商。 本公司于1996年2月在香港联合交易所有限公司上市。现时本公司为摩根士丹利资本国际(MSCI)中国指数成份股及恒生中国（香港上市）100指数成份股。 今后，本集团仍将发展焦点集中于食品制造、营销及流通行业，并继续强化通路与销售系统网络。 Tingyi (Cayman Islands) Holding Corp. (the “Company”), and its subsidiaries (the “Group”) specialise in the production and distribution of instant noodles and beverages in the People’s Republic of China (the “PRC”). The Group started its instant noodle business in 1992, and expanded into instant food business and beverage business in 1996. In March 2012, the Group further expanded its beverage business by forming a strategic alliance with PepsiCo for the beverage business in the PRC. The Company exclusively manufactures, bottles, packages, distributes and sells PepsiCo soft drinks in the PRC. The Group’s main business segments have established leading market shares in the PRC’s food industry. After years of hard work and accumulation, “Master Kong” has become one of the best-known brands among consumers in the PRC. Being a leading brand in the fast moving consumer goods industry, Master Kong has to hold the industry responsibility of food safety and quality guarantee. The Group constantly builds and improves management system, establishes risk prevention management system, implements entire control over food safety and ensures product quality and safety. We will constantly strive for product quality and food safety, as well as provide consumers with safe, tasty and healthy food products. The Group distributed its products throughout the PRC through its extensive sales network consisting of 340 sales offices and 341 warehouses serving 80,726 wholesalers and 256,567 direct retailers as of 31 December 2021. This extensive sales network is a significant contributor to the Group’s leading market position and it enables the Group to introduce new products rapidly and effectively. The Company was listed on The Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Limited in February 1996. The Company is a constituent stock of Morgan Stanley Capital International (MSCI) China Index and Hang Seng China (Hong Kong-listed) 100 Index. Focused on food manufacture, sales and distribution business, the Group will continue to strengthen its logistics and sales network in the PRC.

title: CMF Graphic Designer
company_info: At ION Mobility, we are driven by our mission for clean air through better mobility through cutting edge technology and providing seamless user experiences. We are driving the next frontier of the automotive industry by developing desirable mobility solutions to provide clean alternatives for urban users, not only to alleviate urban air pollution but to lead the next generation of EVs in this region. We are pushing the limits of electric automotive-grade motorbike tech and supply chain across Asia, so as to ship products that combines advanced software and hardware with human-centered design that is for everyone to use, every day. We are a team of over 30 people across Singapore, Shenzhen and Jakarta; serial entrepreneurs and cross-disciplinary designers and engineers that create great products and seamless experiences for our customers. We are backed by top venture, corporate and angel investors such as Monk's Hill Ventures, Village Global, TNB Aura, 500 Durians, AngelCentral, kipleX and Seeds Capital. Join us today!
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Join our visionary vehicle company as a CMF Graphic Designer, where you'll immerse yourself in the thrilling world of Colour, Material, and Finish design. As a CMF Graphic Designer, you'll be at the forefront of shaping the future of automotive aesthetics, the way our products are perceived and experienced while unleashing your boundless creativity to create stunning visual experiences for our cutting-edge motorbikes.

Key Responsibilities:
Innovation Embodied: Elevate the concept of CMF design, pushing the boundaries of creativity, and transforming ideas into mind-blowing reality. Your designs will pave the way for revolutionary new products that leave a lasting impression.
Aesthetic Excellence: Develop captivating and trendsetting colour schemes, materials, and finishes that resonate with our customers, while also complementing the core values and brand identity of our company.
Design for Differentiation: Collaborate closely with our multidisciplinary design teams to create unique and unforgettable visual identities for each product. Your expertise will ensure our products stand out amidst the competition, forging an emotional connection with our customers.
Trendsetting Exploration: Stay ahead of the curve by researching and identifying emerging trends, materials, and technologies. Your ability to anticipate the future of design will keep our products relevant, desirable, and on the cutting edge of industry trends.
Material Exploration: Dive into the world of emerging materials and finishes, experimenting with the latest technologies and surface treatments to craft unprecedented visual experiences that define the future of automotive luxury.
Storytelling through Design: Utilise your artistic expertise to tell compelling stories through the combination of colours, materials, graphics and finishes. Your designs will evoke emotions, resonate with our customers, and elevate the overall product experience.
Prototype Development: Create stunning prototypes and mock-ups that bring your ideas to life, enabling stakeholders to envision the final product and make data-driven decisions.
User-Centric Approach: Understand our diverse customer base and apply a user-centric approach to your designs. Strive to deliver products that cater to the unique tastes and preferences of our target audiences.
Quality Assurance: Oversee the production process, ensuring that the selected CMF elements are flawlessly executed by our manufacturing partners. Maintain the highest standards of quality in every aspect of your designs.
Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Industrial Design, or related field.
Proven experience in CMF design, demonstrating a strong portfolio of innovative and captivating work.
Proficiency in industry-standard design software (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite, CAD is a big plus).
Strong understanding of manufacturing processes and materials to ensure design feasibility.
Ability to collaborate effectively within cross-functional teams and communicate design concepts confidently.
Passion for exploring new design trends, materials, and technologies.
Exceptional attention to detail and a keen eye for aesthetics.
Flexibility to adapt to changing project requirements and deadlines.
Why Join Us:
At ION Mobility, we foster a dynamic and collaborative work environment that thrives on creativity, ambition, and diversity. We are not merely building motorbikes; we are crafting experiences that resonate with riders on a profound level. As a CMF Graphic Designer, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of electric motorbikes, leaving a lasting impact on the industry and inspiring generations of riders to come.
This role is an exciting and challenging opportunity to unleash your artistic genius, push the boundaries of design, and redefine the essence of freedom on two wheels. Join us as we ride towards a future where innovation knows no limits and every road leads to adventure. Apply now and embark on a thrilling journey of design excellence and personal growth!

Our hiring process
Apply and tell us about yourself - It would be helpful to showcase your works through a portfolio
Get on a virtual preliminary call with our HR representative and get more insights on the company culture
Complete a take home exercise
Interview with our creative experts on-site
Offer from HR
Are you ready to hop on the EV wagon?
About ION Mobility
We are pushing the frontiers of what is possible by developing desirable products as clean alternatives for urban users, to alleviate urban air pollution, and to lead the inevitable transition to EVs across Southeast Asia. Our team is constantly pushing the boundaries of innovation and design to create an electric riding experience that doesn’t compromise on quality or style.

Join the team to bring about the future of mobility with us today!

title: Communications & Digital Design Producer
company_info: At Eden + Elie, we're more than a brand – we're a community of passionate artisans, creatives, and visionaries. Our journey is guided by a deep commitment to craftsmanship, creativity, and authenticity. As a team, we believe in pushing boundaries and redefining elegance, one handcrafted piece at a time. Our work environment thrives on collaboration, innovation, and a shared love for what we create. We value diversity and inclusivity, embracing unique perspectives that enrich our designs and ideas. job_category: Advertising / Media, Design, Marketing / Public Relations
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Overview
The Communications and Digital Design Producer is instrumental to supporting all key
marketing initiatives for the brand with a strong emphasis on website and social media content,
digital campaigns, as well as other design support for Eden + Elie’s global digital marketing.

You must have a strong passion for design, and be curious about trends in sustainable fashion,
lifestyle and luxury. You should possess strong writing skills and be able to write different types
of communication including product descriptions, ad copy, newsletters and blog. You should
keep up to date on the latest creative trends in communications and social content creation, with
a strong orientation towards digital formats including but not limited to video formats ie Reels,
Tik Tok and other UGC.

You have the ability to both create content as well as coordinate content production with
external partners eg photographers, videographers, pr agencies and influencers. You will have
a strong role in creating compelling digital and social experiences that address Eden + Elie’s
strategic needs.

Job Description

● Conceptualize and design content to be deployed across all global social/digital
channels
● Support larger digital team on digital design and copywriting eg for website, newsletter,
other assets creation.
● Brainstorm content strategy and propose editorial calendar for social channels
● Ensure a high level of excellence in all creative work produced and that the execution is consistent, cohesive and stays on-brand
● Manage and organize the brand’s asset library
● Support digital team with photo-editing, graphic design and creation and all visual assets as needed across different digital platforms.
● Be able to manage your own stream of work and coordinate deliverables with team members and external partners/stakeholders, consultants to set deadlines.
● Highly disciplined quality assurance before hand-offs of all projects

Required Qualifications

● Diploma or College degree in Graphic Design, Communications or related field
● Some experience in a digital creative related experience, with a strong portfolio showing creative thinking and commercial advertising solutions across all different digital platforms.
● Demonstrated strong layout design skills and with ability to convey complex ideas in a straightforward and visually-appealing manner
● Strong written communication skills and ability to follow brand messaging guidelines
● Photo art direction/styling experience a plus
● Well-organized, with solid time management skills and ability to manage to high work volumes and process multiple projects simultaneously and follow up on projects with a strong sense of urgency
● Able to work alone with minimal direction, as well as part of a larger team
● Team player who is collaborative, ethical and organized with strong communication skills
● Must have high level of excellence in fashion/luxury aesthetic and extremely detailfocused
● Self-motivated, strong work ethic and hardworking professional with a positive attitude
and works well under pressure in a team environment
● Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (InDesign, Photoshop and Illustrator a must, After Effects a plus)
● Experience with Canva, Planoly, Klayvio desirable
● Strong communication skills (written and verbal)
● Proactive and creative problem solver
● Strong analytical and deductive skills

description:
Roles & Responsibilities
As part of the Seagate Brand Creative Team, the Graphic Designer in this full-time position has the talent, passion, and experience to deliver world-class graphic design solutions, user experience, and storytelling for our Seagate brands for both outbound marketing and internal corporate branding.

The ideal candidate will be self-driven, detail-oriented, articulate, innovative, and imaginative with exceptional design, customer service, interpersonal, communication, and project management skills, and will be responsible for developing and maintaining our visual language across a variety of online and offline materials. This position reports directly to our Design Lead in the Global Marketing Organization.
Work closely with stakeholders, content creators, and copywriters to develop inspiring concepts and finished solutions that align with our brand vision and build upon our brand stories.
Create visuals for creative campaign assets, product launch materials, web design and UX elements, and other internal corporate and external marketing projects assigned to our internal creative team.
Ensure design and brand consistency across all projects and channels, including collaboration with agency partners as needed.
Assist in image asset library and organization of brand portal, website, or other channels as needed.
Ability to present and clearly communicate the creative vision and business strategy behind concepts in a coherent, confident, and inspiring manner.
About you:
Demonstrate a keen understanding of the importance of designing to meet business and project objectives within a corporate brand structure.
Display strong conceptual skills, a meticulous eye for detail, and the ability to take a project from inception to completion to meet tight and evolving deadlines.
Ability to work independently and with cross-functional teams in a collaborative, teamwork environment, across various locations remotely.
Ability to take creative direction and go through iterative rounds of revisions to deliver best work.
Possess project management skills with ability to prioritize and handle multiple projects to meet tight deadlines.
Ability to work within established processes, workflow, and project management tools for optimal efficiency and output.
Your experience includes:
Design-related college degree required (BFA or equivalent in graphic design, digital media design, UX design or other visual arts).
Minimum 2 years of creative development, brand and design experience, and online visual executions.
Adobe Creative Cloud (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, XD, etc.), Microsoft Office Suite (including O365), CSS required.

title: Junior Graphic Designer
company_info: Cariuma is a sustainable sneaker brand founded by two former footwear industry executives. They felt it vital to reinvent the sneaker game and reshape the industry by example—to better serve people and the planet through transparency, positivity, and a constant evolution mindset. By embracing personal style over status-quo trends, we empower conscious consumers to buy quality over quantity (the only true answer to sustainability). That’s why we source our materials responsibly and design timeless silhouettes. We also maintain ethical factories and employ a strict code of conduct in our day-to-day operations. For every pair of sneakers we sell, we plant a pair of trees in the Brazilian rainforest. www.cariuma.com
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
About CARIUMA
Cariuma stems from a commitment to our planet and the people on it.

We first bonded over our Brazilian roots, and a love of surfing, skateboarding and snowboarding. As former fashion execs— we knew industry-standard sneakers were lacking in quality, and that the big corporations didn't care about sustainability or social responsibility.

We started CARIUMA in 2018, to create shoes in a way that would merge ethics and aesthetics: timeless silhouettes that balanced a new-school approach to style and comfort.

We've made it our mission to reinvent the sneaker game, while doing our part for the planet. Fast-forward to [2022]— we have replanted 1.1 million trees in the Brazilian rainforest, we're a proudly certified B Corporation, and we support ambassadors made up of some of the world's most talented professional surfers and skateboarders.

We are proud to have our teams in cities like Singapore, Los Angeles, New York, São Paulo, and more.
About the role
You will be working with a team of designers, supporting the marketing team in conceptualising and producing assets for product launches and collaborations with partners like Pantone, Peanuts, 4ocean, Razer and more.
Conceptualising and creating digital content would a major focus in this role. With a worldwide customer base, the platforms you will work on includes, but is not limited to Website, Email, Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Pinterest, Tiktok and Google.
Responsibilities
Conceptualise, design and produce digital content (artworks and videos) based on brand guidelines for platforms mentioned above.
Research and share creative ideas, that can be inspired by brands within and/or outside of our industry
Support social media team in content creation and storytelling
Support photoshoots for product launches
Ensure high quality deliverables while working within the brand guidelines
Required Qualifications:

title: Junior Designer
company_info: Ashley-Edison(UK) is a manufacturing specialist of Electrical Machinery & Equipment. Our associated power quality products includes voltage control solutions such as AC Automatic Voltage Stabilisers, AC Power Line Conditioners, Voltage Drop Compensators, UPS and Frequency Converters. Established in 1977 and headquartered in the U.K. and Singapore, Ashley-Edison meets the growing demands for high power quality – globally. Our mission is to provide optimised voltage regulating solutions to electrical systems and facilities to international clients from Government Organisations to Fortune500 corporations. These clients include the United Nations; U.S. Navy, national grid operator Singapore Power; Formula One Singapore Grand Prix; and Marina Bay Sands. Exciting opportunities and overseas training is made available to our employees.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Looking to finally get ahead in your design career? Expand your experience and immerse yourself in the unique world of industrial marketing design in electrical engineering! (ok we know.. it doesn’t sound like much, BUT…)
Despite our industry, we’re wildly passionate about our designs, and we’re ready to turn the engineering industry from ‘sleepy’ to sexy—through absolute innovative design. Like you, we aspire to forge new grounds, communicate fresh takes on the field and change the way the engineering industry is seen.
And to knock this one out of the park, we’re inviting fellow maverick designers like you to join our tribe!

- - -

Together with you, we want to produce some of the highest-quality design work in the engineering field! Effective assets for our websites and collateral you’d be proud of!
But if you absolutely fear the hectic long hours of working in an agency—then this role is for YOU.

The marketing team at Ashley Edison Asia Pte Ltd is seeking a Junior Designer to take charge of our web & marketing design efforts, spend your upcoming year transforming our creatives and design direction:

Job Description:

Job Scope for 6 Months (Working with the Marketing and Art Directors)
To develop and improve the design of the company’s website—plan with wireframes and mockups
To improve the user journey on our website through intuitive UI/UX designs & enticing visuals
To translate ideas visually for social media & emailers
To produce effective sales & marketing collaterals—brochures and catalogues
Job Requirements:
1-2 years of experience
Some experience in Web design layout, elements & graphics, including icons, banners etc, websites & social media posts
Communicate/propose concepts and design internally to the team
Effectively organised and visually aesthetic for business-communications design
Responsibly deliver designs with professionalism and quality at all times
Higher Nitec/Diploma related to: Digital Media Design and Visual Communication or Graphic Design.
Skill Requirements:
Taking instructions & adaptive
Ability to think outside-the-box
Eye for detail & an eye for design
Creative yet organised
WordPress basics
2
Canva
Work independently and as part of a team
Your own laptop
Bonus Skill sets:
(Not required but it will give you a huge advantage)
HTML Basics
Coding/web development skills
Elementor (WordPress) basics
UI/UX related skills
LinkedIn familiarity
Experience in a startup
3D modelling
Video/Animation Production

Company Profile
We believe in good work from good people. Like what you’re looking for in a good job, we too desire a good level of attitude, professionalism and quality.
The goal is to develop effective communications design that we can be proud of, and one that converts.
We also need attractive design and social media creatives that capture the attention of our target audience.
Our website, social presence and communications collaterals are constantly evolving and we need someone who can work with us to further improve it! While it’s no Apple or Hypebeast, we want to take the engineering industry to the next level!
Sounds simple, yet there’s much to be done, but much more for you to gain...

Learning Outcome

Work closely with a passionate marketing team and explore beyond a typical Designer’s job scope:
Learn critical thinking about what makes an audience tick, and what makes them click.
Out-of-the-box thought processes on transforming technical products into a captivating work of art—that your viewers cannot ignore.
Crafting social media creatives that convert the minds and hearts of your followers.

Our Culture

At Ashley Edison, we believe in a work-life balance culture that promotes healthy mental wealth, a stress-free working environment, and ultimately, a better-together collaborative space to elevate your personal development growth.
9-5 (No Overtime)
Society says: “Your 9-5 pays your bills, and your 6-10 builds your skills.”
We say: You get the best of both worlds—in your 9-5 with us.
Employees are not required to work overtime, which means you have the freedom of more time—for your personal side hustle, or for what matters more to you.
Empowering Growth & Development
We believe that being a passive recipient of information—is detrimental to the goals you’ve set to achieve for yourself. What we provide, is dedicated leadership that offers hand-holding guidance to help you succeed, and then push even further.
Collaborative Work Culture
As a small team, we operate as one single unit, no voice is too small to be heard. Unlike larger corporations, we believe in open communications within teams that essentially allow you to see, and be seen.
Massive Opportunities To Spearhead Projects
Theory without experience is just philosophy. Take the lead on projects or campaigns as you steer the ships and gain massive experience in what you love doing best.
If you feel we're a good fit for you, drop us your detailed CV—along with your current and expected salary, or simply contact us to discuss further. Bonus: Begin your interview with the words “Hire me”, so we’ll know, you’ve read every word. This will give you a huge edge up!

Does this sound like a job that loves you back? Contact us to learn more.

__________________________________________________________________________________________
Think Tank Studio is a curatorial studio that makes meaning in a complex world by crafting compelling stories and experiences.
We do this through our own products — current affairs and educational magazines Broader Perspectives, Present Perfect and Represent. We also help other organisations craft meaningful stories and experiences through our specialisations in research, content, design and communication.
We believe that if stories are told and platforms built to allow people to expand and reframe their observations and points of view, we can build the social and emotional capital crucial for an empathetic and inclusive society.

Experience with UI and UX design on large scale, complex business software system or business-oriented SaaS software systems

Experience in cross-browser and cross-device compatibility issues
Knowledgeable in best practices for web-based information architecture and design, and well-versed in usability principles and techniques

Team player with the ability to work adapt and work in a fast pace environment

title: Senior Visual Designer
company_info: We build the bridge between you and your clients through Design Oscar partners with marketing, product and board level leaders to help you build meaningful stories and expe­­­­­­riences to serve your clients better.
address: SONG LIN BUILDING, 1 SYED ALWI ROAD 207628
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
We are looking for a top notch Visual Designer, interested in Graphic Design and UI/ UX Design

We are looking for a 'T-Shaped' Graphic Designer. (Meaning deep mastery of a select design skill but also have the skills needed for research, storytelling, and design.) If you have the rare combination of both creative muscles and an analytical mind, then you should be on our team.

Who are we?
Oscar is Singapore’s leading visual B2B communication agency. We unpack complex ideas and concepts and repackage them into engaging and compelling visual stories. Our designers are a cut above the rest – imaginative problem-solvers who can look at the big picture while reading between the lines.

Who are we looking for?
We are in search of a top-notch Designer who can create appealing visual stories for a roster of world-leading fintech clients through spot-on infographics, or empactful UI/UX. We need someone who is able to gain a deep understanding of clients and their products, and transform what clients want to say into extraordinary visuals that grab attention and bring clarity to complexity.

What can you look forward to?
Being able to build relationships with some of the world’s top companies, work on interesting and stimulating projects, receive a competitive remuneration package. Be part of a talented, dynamic team of Animators, Illustrators, and UX Designers, based in Singapore.

Are you cut out for our team?
You’re able to see a crystal-clear picture of the client’s business needs and requirements, and use that to build up an effective visual story
You can visualize and come up with the extra ingredients needed to make an top level visual.
You’re passionate about design and are aware of best industry practices
You show great attention to detail, not only in your work but in how you present your work to clients
You possess confident communication skills
You have a great amount of patience and won’t shy away from a challenge
You are an energetic, self-motivated individual with a mission to create powerful work of the highest quality
Do you fit the bill?
You have a degree/diploma in Design Communication
Good mastery of Illustrator, Photoshop, Figam
Vector 2D Graphics
Happy to work in PowerPoint, and other business communication software.

Our Designers are the best in the business – they listen hard, read between the lines, intuit what isn’t verbalised and then channel that into outstanding visual experiences

What will you get in return? You’ll get incredible exposure to some of the world’s best brands, interesting work you can sink your teeth into, a competitive remuneration package and the support of an exceptional team

title: Creative Marketing Associate - Graphic Designer
company_info: COSMIC DINER SINGAPORE PTE. LTD.
job_category: Advertising / Media, Design, Events / Promotions, F&B, Marketing / Public Relations
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Position: Creative Marketing Associate - Graphic Designer

About Us:
Founded in 2014, Kanpai Group set forth on an unwavering mission - to infuse invigorating vitality into Singapore's F&B realm. Beyond conventional roles, we transcend the label of customers, embracing our patrons as esteemed guests. Our scope extends far beyond transactions, orchestrating immersive events that chisel enduring connections into the very fabric of memory. A diverse culinary palette guarantees a plate for every guest, as our authentic camaraderie and unforgettable experiences intertwine, culminating in a vibrant mosaic of celebration.


Job Overview:
Kanpai Group is seeking a Creative Marketing Associate - Graphic Designer who is not just a designer but an artistic visionary. The ideal candidate will have a unique blend of creativity, attention to detail, and a deep understanding of design principles. This role requires the ability to translate concepts into compelling visual designs that captivate our audience and enhance our brand presence.

Responsibilities:
Innovative Artwork: Develop creative and imaginative visual designs that resonate with our target audience and enhance the customer experience across all touchpoints.
Promotion and Detail: Create artwork that effectively communicates promotional messages and event details through innovative and visually appealing designs.
Design Diversity: Possess a versatile range of design skills and knowledge to craft visuals for various themed events and occasions, ensuring that each design aligns with its unique context.
Attention to Detail: Be meticulous and concise, conducting thorough spell checks and quality assurance to deliver error-free designs.
Trend Research: Stay proactive and take the initiative to research new design and media trends, incorporating them into your design work to keep our visuals fresh and engaging.
Keen Eye for Detail: Pay meticulous attention to every element of design, ensuring that the final product meets high-quality standards and aligns with the company's brand guidelines.
Time Management: Efficiently manage your time to meet project deadlines and handle multiple design tasks simultaneously.
Conceptualization: Have the ability to conceptualize designs from scratch, bringing originality to your work, and not solely relying on template-based tools.
Qualifications:
Studied Graphic Design, Visual Communication, or related field.
Proven experience in graphic design, with a portfolio showcasing a diverse range of design styles and projects.
Proficiency in graphic design software.
Strong understanding of design principles, color theory, typography, and layout.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
A proactive attitude towards staying updated on design trends and tools.
Exceptional attention to detail and strong time management skills.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines consistently.
Strong conceptual and creative thinking abilities.
Work Location, Remuneration Package & Benefits:
Office located at Club Street
5 days work week, 1pm to 10.30pm
Salary from $2600 to $4000 (Commensurate with experience)
Quarterly incentives from $1800 to $4500 (Commensurate with Company's sales target achievement and Department's KPI)
Annual Dental Grooming Budget
Annual Mental Wellness Budget
Annual Medical Budget
Annual Leave
How to Apply:
Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience and explaining why you would be a great fit for Kanpai Group's Creative Marketing Associate - Graphic Designer role to Nicole at 96239580. Include any design projects that showcase your creativity and versatility.

title: Graphic & Web Designer
company: OSG CONTAINERS AND MODULAR PTE. LTD.
company_info: O S G Contractor Pte Ltd has been supplying and leasing reconditioned (Recon) containers in Singapore since 2001. Our containers have high degrees of mobility and functionality as portrayed by our products including temporary offices, heavy-duty storage, well disposed WCs and even standalone showrooms. The company’s yard is located along the Western bank of Jurong River, ensuring you that our containers are strictly refurbished locally. Today, O S G has delivered over thousands of such containers for office, storage, sanitary and other purposes, to numerous sectors, such as construction, marine, military, government and logistics. Our clients include Far East Organisation, NParks, Shimizu Corporation, Dragages Singapore Pte Ltd, Singapore Boys’ Home, Republic of Singapore Yacht Club, Asahi Kasei Corporation, Hyundai Engineering & Construction Co. Ltd, Fujian Chengjian Construction, WF Engineering, Serangoon Gardens Country Club, Institute of Mental Health amongst others
job_category: Advertising / Media, Building and Construction, Design, Events / Promotions, Marketing / Public Relations
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Graphic & web designer
Design and develop content for marketing collaterals (online & offline) to support various, brochures, banner, promotions, campaigns, web and catalogue designing: advertising in directories
Design, manage & execute creative ideas to create digital design work for company’s web properties, social media accounts and e-commerce platforms
Drive content creation on web properties and social media platforms (including Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Instagram, YouTube, Google Business) to attract leads
Manage digital marketing to improve traffic and web ranking for leads generation
Create & establish the look and feel of the brand/campaigns in order to develop leads and stimulate sales. Design logo, icons, gifts and web design.
Coordinate marketing collaterals with potential vendors whenever necessary
Conceptualise and implement promotions and campaigns to promote sales and product knowledge among internal and external stakeholders.
Track demographic trends and performance indications and generate report.
Create new converting and interactive design/ layout in order to support the marketing team in optimizing their content and inbound marketing strategies.
Maintain a marketing calendar to track all above activities.
Any other Ad-hoc duties assigned by the company
Requirements
Min 2 years of working experience
Well versed in Social media, SEO & SEM
Proficient competent with Graphic Design, Video & Web Editing, photoshop & illustration.
Knowledge of image editing and digital sketching software, i.e. Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator required
Photography and videography skills preferred
Proficient in both English and Chinese (Spoken and written)
Excellent English writing skills
Possess strong interpersonal and communication attributes
Proactive team player, responsible, self-driven and organised.
Able to handle work pressure and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment
Above all else, we hope you are:

Excited about what our company does
A reliable and responsible individual who takes pride in your work
A hardworking individual who strives to excel

Interested applicants, please send update resume, portfolio, address & last drawn salary. We regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified. (Agency will not be entertain)

Company Overview
Achieve a promising career with OSG by joining our journey to become Singapore’s leading supplier of containers and modular space solutions! Get acquainted with clients from a wide range of industries, government and MNCs! Accepted candidates can look forward to a friendly, respectful and rewarding working environment. Join our family now!
Our company is one of the leading suppliers of cabin containers in Singapore that provide portable, affordable and flexible space solutions. We strive to deliver reliable products and warm service to our customers from many different industries including Building & Construction, Manufacturing, Maritime and Services. As we expand, we will continue to bring out the best in our people and seek better working experience & environment.

We believe in building for all a:
1) Progressive working environment
2) Friendly & respectful culture
3) Rewarding & enriching experience

Our core values are being Optimal, Smart & Genuine.
